alert.note: Alert for Hale; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Perry and southeastern Hale Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 725 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greensboro Municipal Airport, or over Greensboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Newbern, Greensboro Municipal Airport and Morgan Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Alabama.
